data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bello, Cesare, Osella, Giuseppe, Baviera, Cosimo (2016): A taxonomic revision of the genus Baldorhynchus (Di Marco & Osella, 2002) stat. n. (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Entiminae). Zootaxa 4070 (1): 1-101, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4070.1.1|68 occurrences
